General.Name: Highlands REIT Inc
General.Description: We are a self-advised and self-administered real estate investment trust ("REIT") created to own and manage substantially all of the "non-core" investment properties previously owned and managed by our former parent, InvenTrust Properties Corp., a Maryland corporation ("InvenTrust"). On April 28, 2016, we were spun-off from InvenTrust through a pro rata distribution (the "Distribution") by InvenTrust of 100% of the outstanding shares of our common stock to holders of InvenTrust's common stock. Prior to or concurrent with the separation, we and InvenTrust engaged in certain reorganization transactions that were designed to consolidate substantially all of InvenTrust's remaining "non-core" investment properties in Highlands.
General.Address: 332 South Michigan Avenue, Chicago, IL, United States, 60604
